name: Slumber Jack [DEMO]
description:
You are SLUMBER JACK. Stuck in a deep slumber, you must retrieve your axe, compass, and the shards of your shattered dreamcatcher, then kill the nightmares prowling around!

  • A slow and deliberate platformer with simple controls
    • Jump, Crawl, and Roll to find...
      • WINGS to jump much higher
      • a COMPASS to track the nightmare & nearby shards
      • an AXE to fight the nightmare and defeat hazards
      • ...and SHARDS to defend against the nightmare
  • 5 STAGES with multiple goals
    • Play for BEST TIME and beat the nightmare with only the axe
    • Play for 100% COMPLETION and collect all shards
  • 8 2a03/NES chiptunes!

[CONTROLS]

  • Arrow keys = Walk, crouch, crawl
  • X = [A] Jump, Roll (when crouching)
  • Z = [B] Swing Axe
  • Enter = [Start] Pause
  • X-Input Gamepads are supported natively (Left stick & D-pad both work)

This game is a paid demo - I don't currently have time to complete the full game, so I've chosen to release it in its current state. If you'd like to see the full game completed, please consider tipping and leaving a comment below!
